abilities.name: DARKFORCE CLOAK
abilities.description: Inflict continuous damage on an enemy. Attacks will target the nearest enemy to the crosshair, dealing damage.

abilities.name: DARK TELEPORTATION
abilities.description: Enshroud nearby allies in the Darkforce Dimension, plunging them into the Phased state, making them untargetable and invisible to enemies and granting them a Movement Boost. Allies within the area gain Invisibility and Movement Boost.

abilities.name: TERROR CAPE
abilities.description: Deploy a Veil of Darkforce to damage enemies upon touch, applying Blind to narrow their sight and Vulnerability to amplify damage received. The spell field advances along the casting path.
abilities.range: Width: 6m, Height: 4.5m - Visibility is obstructed beyond 10m

abilities.name: LIGHTFORCE DAGGER
abilities.description: Unleash a bouncing Lightforce Dagger to damage enemies and heal nearby allies. The projectile features an attraction effect, pulling in the closest target to the crosshair and creating a spell field upon impact. This spell field provides healing effects.
abilities.casting: Single-cast projectile that generates a spell area upon impact
abilities.details:
HEALING - 10 per hit - 18 AoE per hit
16 per hit - 16 AoE per hit (after 25/03/14)

abilities.name: DAGGER STORM
abilities.description: Launch a volley of daggers, creating a Healing Over Time field in the impact area
abilities.casting: Single-cast projectile with delayed impact that also generates a spell field

abilities.name: VEIL OF LIGHTFORCE
abilities.description: Deploy a Veil of Lightforce to heal allies upon touch and grant them a Healing Boost. The spell field advances along the casting path.

ultimate.name: ETERNAL BOND
ultimate.description: Perform four rapid dashes, healing allies and damaging enemies along the path. Each individual energy carpet lasts for 5 seconds. Players can change the direction of this ability between the dash pauses.  After activating, the duration of the first three healing zones will no longer be calculated separately; instead, they will remain active until the duration of the final healing zone ends, at which point all will be removed together. Now, the healing effect from each segment will not stack; when overlapping, only one healing effect is applied. Additionally, camera control is unlocked during the activation.
ultimate.range: A cylindrical spell field with a 4m radius and 15m in length
ultimate.details:
Number of dashes: 3
4 (after 25/01/10)
HEALING - 220/s
250/s (after 25/02/21)
Pause time between segments: 1s
0.67s (after 25/02/21)

passives.name: FROM SHADOW TO LIGHT
passives.description: Cloak & Dagger can inject light and dark energy into Moon Knight to create a Light & Dark Realm where Moon Knight can become Invisible.

teamups.name: FROM SHADOW TO LIGHT
teamups.effect: Cloak & Dagger can inject light and dark energy into Moon Knight to create a Light & Dark Realm where Moon Knight can become Invisible.

gameplay.strategy_overview: Embrace the dynamic duo's ability to seamlessly transition between damage and support. Frequently swap between Cloak and Dagger to keep Dagger's weapon reloaded and to apply timely blinds with 'Terror Cape' to set up eliminations. Utilize Dagger's healing bubble strategically in chokepoints or around grouped allies for significant healing. While their ultimate offers powerful team-wide healing, be aware of the vulnerability during its animation and position accordingly.
weaknesses: Susceptible to dives as she lacks any form of mobility outside of her Ultimate.
Lightforce Dagger doesn't auto-lock on deployable units, such as Moon Knight's Ancient Ankh or Peni Parker's Bionic Spider-Nest.
Veil of Lighforce does not pass through walls or other terrain.
They can still be damaged and taken down during Eternal Bond.
In addition, on certain maps with high terrain inclinations, Cloak & Dagger may get stuck during the dashes.

Darkforce Cloak has limited range, requiring Cloak to get into mid-close range. This, combined with his low max health, can make it risky to engage directly against enemies without the rest of the team.
Very vulnerable if Dark Teleportation is on cooldown.
In addition, this ability's effects only last for 2 seconds.
Terror Cape's blinding effect only lasts for 1.5 seconds.

achievements.name: Street Justice
achievements.description: As Cloak & Dagger, assist Spider-Man in landing one KO.

achievements.name: Symphony of Light and Dark
achievements.description: As Cloak & Dagger, assist allies in achieving a team wipe.

lore_details.ingame_bio_quote: We are Cloak and Dagger. We are hope and fear.
lore_details.ingame_bio_text: Tyrone Johnson and Tandy Bowen are nearly inseparable, like two sides of the same coin. Intertwined by forces of shadow and light, Cloak & Dagger fight as a united front, dealing havoc and healing allies across the arena.

hero_stories.title: A Brief Farewell
hero_stories.content:
The back alleys of New York City had never been safe. Back when Tyrone Johnson and Tandy Bowen were just teenage runaways, they'd found themselves fighting to survive the cruel realities of living on the streets. When they gained their superpowers, becoming the crime fighting duo known as Cloak and Dagger, they vowed to shed a little light â€” and darkness â€” on the most dangerous corners of the city so that no one else would ever have to live in fear again.
But now, fear had taken over â€” not just in the alleys, but across the entire island of Manhattan. Dracula, the Lord of the Vampires, had come to town, and had somehow managed to lock the Big Apple in a state of eternal night. His bloodsucking minions were on a rampage, and there were only a few heroes left to protect the innocent citizens of NYC from being involuntarily drafted into the vampire army's ranks. [Continues...]

changes: Cloak & Dagger were released as the 32nd character to be introduced to Marvel Rivals as a Strategist hero.
Added 2 new costumes: Lemon Lime and Growth & Decay.
Added the Symphony of Light and Dark achievement.
Added to the Lunar Force Team-Up Ability with Moon Knight.

balance_changes.date_version: 25/01/10: Version 20250110 / Season 1: Eternal Night Falls Launch
changes: Reduce Dagger Storm cooldown from 15s to 12s.
Increase the number of dashes in Eternal Bond from 3 to 4.
Resolved an issue where, while using their ultimate, if being frozen by Luna Snow, Cloak & Dagger would remain frozen even after taking damage. They can now break free from Luna's icy grips!
Increase the energy cost to activate Eternal Bond from 3400 to 4000.
The healing amount of each segment will be increased from 220/s to 250/s, the duration will be reduced from 10s to 8s, and the pause time between segments decrease from 1s to 0.67s.
Now, the healing effect from each segment will not stack; when overlapping, only one healing effect is applied.
Additionally, camera control is unlocked during the activation of Eternal Bond.
Increase the Vulnerability inflicted on enemies by Terror Cape from 20% to 28%.
Added 1 new costume: Twilight Duo.
Increase the healing effect from Lightforce Dagger on hit allies from 10 to 16.
Reduce the spell field healing amount generated by the hit from 18 to 16.
Fixed an issue where Cloak or Dagger sometimes left their character model lingering for a brief moment during form switches. Now, they'll slip into action smoother than a stealthy shadow.

After activating Eternal Bond, the duration of the first three healing zones will no longer be calculated separately; instead, they will remain active until the duration of the final healing zone ends, at which point all will be removed together.
Added 1 new costume: Dance Partner.
As Cloak, increase the damage of the Darkforce Cloak from 75/s to 80/s.
As Dagger, increase the damage of the Lightforce Dagger on hit from 15 to 18.
We've zapped a bug where their ultimate would sneakily still do damage to foes protected by Magneto's Iron Bulwark or Hulk's Indestructible Guardâ€”talk about an unexpected plot twist!

lore_details.official_description: Cloak & Dagger are a duo of Strategist heroes in Marvel Rivals, and are collectively the 32nd hero introduced to the game's roster. They have a team-up ability that works in conjunction with Moon Knight.

lore_powers_skills: Darkforce manipulation, used for invisibility, intangibility, teleportation, and psychological manipulation
Lightforce manipulation, used to conjure photonic projectiles, force fields, and provide healing and purification
